English: It's cold! Why should we come to this snow mountain in this early morning!
Huh? Rodina?!
Good morning, Mitra. Long time, no see.
I heard that you retired, but I didn't expect to see you here.
Hm hm, I wouldn't imagine running into you outside of the Empire Shooting Contest.
What brings you here?
I came here to help Fluss today.
Huh? You too?
Oh, dear! I'm running a bit late. The two of you are here, so we're waiting for one more.
Hey! What is this about? I came here because the old man ordered me to, but I didn't get any of the details..
Just wait a little bit. Oh, she's here!
Sooooorry! Is Luna late?
(So, so cute!)
Oh, no. What's with this kid? What are we doing?
All of you will help me today to do this!
We'll find the Immortal Rose which grows only on this snow mountain.
First, Luna? Can you remember its scent and find it under the snow?
Okay! Luna can smell through the snow, too! Oh! I can smell there, too!
It seems that all you need is that kid to find it. Why are we here?
It's not that simple. You will see soon enough. Get ready.
Here! The rose is here! Whaaa! Go away! Monster!
Let's go, hurry!
Dang it! Kid, are you alright?
Hey, what is that monster?
I would say it's like a guardian that protects the Immortal Rose.
It's an enemy we'll inevitably need to defeat to get the Rose. Hey, show me what you all got.
We're doing all this just to get some flower?
It's quite rude to say that about the rose that never loses its beauty, even after its plucked.
I have... your order.
I should have known there'd be trouble when the old man told me to go... Dang, this is a hassle.
Luna will fight, too!
Hm hm, they really are the best in the Empire.
Now, then, let's go for the next rose!
Evening on the same day.
I don't know who you are.
I just... know you as a good lady from a story my grandpa told me...
With your sacrifice, our family and I were able to be here today.
I may not be able to meet you,
but I admire and respect you with all my heart.
Please celebrate my birthday together. Immortal Lady...
Today's the day, Mr. Schute!
Yes, Shea! Today is the day. I'm feeling pretty nervous. Are you ready?
Of course! I made a promise with Mr. Schute last year!
On the 16th birthday, I should sing a song at this square.
Uh, ummm. F# is here, and G is...
Ouch, my ears! Haha, look at your fingers, shaking! Don't worry, we can just do it as we practiced.
But I get too nervous when I stand in front of a crowd.
Calm down, Shea. We do have some time, so let's practice a bit more.
Okay, let's go somewhere quiet.
I can sing whatever I want here!
*Rustle*, *Flap*, *Flap*... *Rustle*
Someone's coming!
I hear... this heavenly melody...
This place is a bit creepy, but no one will be coming here, right, Mr. Schute?
Hmm, I feel strong demonic energy here, but it's good for building courage. Let's start!
Let's begin!
*Thump*! *Clump*!
What! Someone's really coming!
It can't be...I hate ghosts! No way!
Just now... That song was a lullaby from my mother.
*Cough* Shea! Where are we? Is this a sandstorm?
I'm sorry, Mr. Schute. I was looking for a place without any people and ended up here.
Let's practice one last time! After this, let's go back to the square.
*Thump*, *Flap*, *Flap* Kyaaa!
Kyahh! D... Dragon?
Hey, don't be afraid! I just wanted to know what the song is. Wait!
What happened...? It's already night!
No one's here. Mr. Schute. I wanted to... *sob* play in front of many people...
I should just forget about singing. I can't be a bard.
There's no bard who's as shy as I am... Nobody is.
Shea...
Don't say that!
No muse in the heavens has a voice like yours.
That's right! Your song... It reminds me of the lullabies my mother would sing.
I can't recall the last time when my heart felt such peace. I was really touched after hearing your song.
Hey! Don't ever think about giving up on singing.
Your song was the best! Well, Laias sings, uh, better, though. Ahem!
Thank you, everyone...
But who are you guys?
(... An angel, demon, and Dragon? Not even the Emperor could bring this group together. Shea.)
(Now we have 3 more in the fan club! Heh heh!)
Hmph! Today is the day!
Should I do some cleaning?
Thank you for coming to the event today, which only happens once a year.
Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the Disguise Fight Championship!
Let me introduce last year's champion, the Beauty Viking!
Pathetic. Go away, losers!
Waaaaa! Please stomp on them!
And now, any challengers?
I challenge her.
She is...! The rookie that was the first runner-up 2 years ago!!
Here comes with Spring Bride!
I've been waiting for this moment! Nic... I mean, Beauty Viking!
... Just don't let me get bored.
Urgh... I'll train harder...
Hmm, that was alright. But you need more than a hundred years to beat me.
Victory to the Beauty Viking!
Are there any other challengers?
I will fight the champion.
Wow! A beautiful outlaw of the sea! It's a new contender, Blonde Pirate!
Surrender if you care for your life. My sword shows no mercy.
Huh! You're quite confident!
I shall see how long you can remain that way!
Urgh... I admit it, I lost.
Haha... But you were decent, Blonde Pirate.
Our champion, Beauty Viking! No one can stop her.
Now, it's time for the main event!
The founder of the Disguise Fight Championship!
The former Champion and last year's first runner-up, Catnip Lover!
Hahaha, it's been a while, everyone!
How have you been, Nicky?
Shut up, stupid cat! Call me Beauty Viking!
Oh, right! We're not supposed to use our real names!
Whatever! Let's fight, Champion!
Hm hm, That's what I want.
Ugh! Dang it!
Haha! Nicky, you're still really good, but I won this time!
Urgh, don't call me by my real name! You cat!
Here comes our new champion!
This year's champion is Catnip Lover!
Wagggghhhh!
Hahaha! Thank you, everyone! It was fun!
Oh, Beauty Viking! I'll expect to see you next year, too!
Haha, stupid cat. You better keep your claws sharp.
Next year's title is mine, don't forget that!
Welcome! Come on in!
Today's the only day to taste our special dishes!
Food truck of Dragon Slayers!
Food truck? What are they selling?
All sorts of dishes made with rare ingredients that I prepared!
A taste recognized by true gourmets! They're only being sold today!
All revenue will be donated to Barbarian Orphanage, so please come and enjoy.
Then, should we try one?
Oh! It smells nice! What is this?
Oh, that dish is pretty avant-garde. It's like a black pudding.
Pudding made with blood of Hellhound smoked with chili powder.
B-blood you said?
How much is it? Give me all you have. Right now! Now!
Oh, alright. Hey, here you are!
Haha, I won't need to hunt for a while!
We normally have a bunch left over... but it sold out this time? Haha...
This melancholic and sad aroma! This coffee must be...!
The best coffee of the Empire, Lotus Eater! How can it be here?
Uh? Oh! That's made with coffee bean swallowed by Slimes in Swamps of Gargoss, right?
I got a request to hunt Slimes recently, so I was able to get a lot afterward.
I didn’t know it was that famous, though.
It is such a rare coffee that it's priceless. But it's so cheap here!
I almost got them for nothing. If you'd like, buy as much as you want!
Thank you. Then, I shall buy…. This much.
Heh! Business today is going well, huh?
I should be able to buy some gifts for kids at the orphanage, too.
*Sniff*, *Sniff*... That delicious smell...
Welcome! What's your favorite dish?
...Meat! It's a delicious meat!
Hey, you need to pay. Mad Dragon Meat isn't free!
Money? What's that? People keep asking me about it after I got here.
In my homeland… there is no such thing.. We just hunt and eat.
Hmm, so you're a foreigner?
Hey, listen. You need to pay if you want to eat food that's for sale.
Then... I cannot eat meat?
I have not had anything to eat since yesterday...
Glurp...
Argh! Well, I don't know.
I wanted to help the kids, anyway...
Just for today, I'll give it to you for free. It's my birthday.
Thank you! So much! I love meat, a lot!
Good person! Give meat! Good and Nice! Happy birthday!
Alright! Thanks for wishing me a happy birthday.
Yanne, happy birthday!
Did you have a lot of customers today?
Eh?
But, how much are you going to eat...?
Son! Wake up! Today's your birthday.
I made 'that' for your breakfast. Get up and...
... I should cook 'that' for today.
'That?'
Crème brûlée.
What?
Crème brûlée.
In here?
I can get somewhat similar to milk in the desert, and I can use a kiln instead of an oven.
The problem will be sugar and eggs.
(He's really going to do it...)
I'll ask some people we met before in the desert.
Sure.
Oh, Theo. It's been a while. You really helped us out last time.
I just did what I had to do.
Even so, we're still grateful. What brings you here, today?
Oh, that's...
I wanted to cook something, so I wanted to ask for some help with the ingredients...
I suppose you'd probably need some utensils, too. So, what did you need?
I need milk, eggs and sugar. A bit of vanilla as well. It'll be great if I can use an oven as well.
I can get you those.
So, are you making a dessert? It should be a special occasion if you're going through all this trouble, especially here.
It's just one of those days. I just felt like eating it.
Really, that's all?
Yes.
Alright, then. The oven's over on this side.
Is it done?
It turned out quite nice. Care to try some?
Thank you. But why this, all of a sudden?
No big reason. Today is just my birthday.
Your birthday? It's today?
Yeah. It's what my mother used to make for me every year.
After she was gone, I'd just make it myself since no one could make it for me.
Don't worry too much about it. This is just sort of a little tradition of mine.
Sir Theo, can I talk to you for a minute?
Yes, of course.
Yes?
Maybe I'm wrong, but it seems like you're in a bit of a pickle.
It's still not late. You can prepare something for him. I guess he likes sweet things.
Ah, I'm not that good at cooking, though...
Don't worry, we can help you. Zafir, can you get more milk?
That's... Wait!
What's going on? I heard something explode in the kitchen.
Please, don't ask...
Laudia just taught me to make some Trovatian sugar cookies.
It's not very good, but I still wanted to wish you a happy birthday.
Eh..umm. For me? Oh... That's, I mean... Th-thank you.
You're welcome.
Knight, who controls the Red Lightning.
Your courage, loyalty, and hope...
You've staked it all, but ended up with this.
Aren't you upset? Are you not furious?
Your lady is dead, her body cold and lifeless.
Your home, utterly demolished.
However, you can still restore this all.
If you would like to change this fate, take my hand.
Come, make a contract with me.
Your story... is not finished yet.
Hm hm, Looking at you reminds me of that joyous moment.
Ahaha, ahahaha...
...What are you talking about?
Speaking of that, all five of the first Demons, including you and I,
share the same birthday today. That is, if we apply the Demonic time to this Material World.
Lucikiel, that was a great birthday gift, I appreciate it.
Destruction of the Republic of Gray... Knight of Red Lightning.
My plan is almost complete, thanks to you.
..Nonsense.
Do what you came to do and go back already, Fundamental Curse.
Oh, please don't disappoint me, Incarnate of destruction.
What would other Demons think if they hear that?
...You didn't come here to make small talk with me, Shamilla.
*Sigh* You're no fun at all.
...Fine, I'll make this short.
Can you do me a favor?
Not interested.
Hm hm hm, then I guess you don't need this.
Perfect God of Lightning, controlling Red and Blue lightning. They will be your good rival.
Oh?
Hm hm, I see that you're interested now.
So, are you willing to do me a favor now?
...Hmph.
Let me hear what you want first.
Hm hm hm, with your power, this should be pretty easy.
Actually, you might even find it quite fun.
It's just difficult for me to ask anyone else to do this.
I want you to find the Transcendant.
...I see.
I'm not asking for much.
And I'm also in no hurry, either.
If you get a lead to a Transcendant,
just let me know first, without killing whoever it is.
That will be enough for this.
...Hm. You say no killing, but you didn't say anything about fighting.
Hm hm, that's because I know you'll fight, anyway.
As long as you don't kill, I can still make use of that.
...Hmph.
Well, now...
Shall we begin the next chapter, then? Hm hm hm...
I heard it's your birthday, Dimael. Congratulations.
We're all able to be here, thanks to you, Dimael. Thank you so much.
We're grateful for all you've done for us. Happy birthday, Captain!
Thank you, Dimael. I could fight without holding back because of you.
Allies... Friends...
My precious comrades... fighting together...
Dimael! Dimael?
Epigael?
Sorry. I overslept.
Did you have a bad dream?
I was worried because you looked bothered while you were sleeping.
I saw my old comrades who fought at Aegina with me in my dream.
They were smiling the whole time. I'm only a fool who couldn't keep them safe.
Dimael...
I'm sorry to have worried you.
No, don't be. I couldn't help it because it's about you.
Although you looked sad while you were sleeping...
you looked somewhat happy, too.
It may be because it's been a long time since you've seen those friends.
I'm sure that they'd also want to celebrate this special day.
Did you remember?
Hm hm, how can I forget?
It's the birthday for my most important person, you.
I prepared a small gift. I'm not sure if you'll like it, though.
Haha, whatever you give, even if it's a pebble you found on the road, I'll treasure it.
Hm hm, Dimael.
This is...!
It's the dagger you shared with your comrades.
I couldn't bring them all, but I wanted to find it for you.
Those who are precious to you are also precious to me, too.
I thought I lost it forever….
You went all the way to Aegina, just to find these keepsakes...
Captain, you need to survive!
We cannot leave you behind!
We're staying with you, Captain!
Everyone...
I'm really sorry that I couldn't protect you till the end...
And, thank you.
Thank you for coming back...
Thank you, Epigael. I mean it, thank you.
This is the best gift I've ever received.
Would you smile for me, then?
It's a happy occasion. I'm sure they'd also want to see you smile.
Yes, you're right.
Thank you, Epigael.
Happy birthday to you, dear Dimael.
